question.title: How to register WAR project to Netflix's Eureka Server?
question.body:
I have 2 separate WAR projects made using Jakarta EE 11, running on 8080 & 8081 on Wildfly. Then I have Netflix's Eureka-Server running on 8761 on Tomcat(Spring Boot Project). How do I make register, these Wildfly running projects on Eureka.

In Spring it is easy, we just need to add spring-cloud-starter-netflix-eureka-client starter, to the project we want to be registered in Eureka-Server then add the annotation @EnableDiscoveryClient in main class, and add the following in application.yml

eureka:
  client:
    service-url:
      defaultZone: http://localhost:8761/eureka/

But how to do this when client projects aren't Spring Boot JAR type, here they are WAR type.

Tried finding tutorials but couldn't find any, all of them demoing on how to do that in Spring Boot.

Is it even possible?
